title: Science Fiction Theatre season 2 eps 1-13 (1956) colorized

sources.title: Science Fiction Theatre season 2 eps 1-13 (1956) colorized
sources.description: In this groundbreaking anthology series, host Truman Bradley introduces stories extrapolated from actual scientific data of the era. Episodes 1-13 of 39 in season 2. I colorized these using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday. If you have questions or requests, please use the Colorized Movies Forum at https://archive.org/details/colorized-movies?tab=forum
